message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think you'd find it very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $95. Let me know if this works for you.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $105. This product is really top-notch and will bring you a lot of value.  Would you be willing to meet me there?
Thanks for getting back to me, Alice. I've been thinking about the product and I think I can offer $100. Let me know what you think.
